title: Video: Watch Israel Adesanya's flashy, choreographed UFC 243 entrance
text:
Gallery Israel Adesanya def. Robert Whittaker at UFC 243: Best photos view 27 images

Israel Adesanya became the undisputed UFC middleweight champion Saturday night when he finished Robert Whittaker in the second round of the UFC 243 main event in Melbourne, Australia.

But before that even happened, “The Last Stylebender” wowed the crowd at Marvel Stadium with a choreographed entrance that included three backup dancers.

It was quite the scene. Check it out (via Twitter):

The Blue Corner is MMA Junkie’s blog space. We don’t take it overly serious, and neither should you. If you come complaining to us that something you read here is not hard-hitting news, expect to have the previous sentence repeated in ALL CAPS.
description: Israel Adesanya walked into Marvel Stadium with swagger and exited as the undisputed UFC middleweight champion.
